attributes.action: Make Cannabis legal for recreational as well as medical use
attributes.background: Cannabis should be legalised for both medical and recreational use because it's significantly safer than alcohol. Legalization would offer a healthier alternative, reduce harm, and align with public health goals. It's time to reform outdated laws for a safer, healthier society.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Reassess the classification of Cannabis and decriminalize it.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700385

Introduce 'Grow Your Own' Laws for Legal Medical Cannabis Patients (CBPM)
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700860
